oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Demonstrator holding the Qur'an and a crucifix
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Osama, Maggie
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photographer's description: This photo was taken before Mubarak's step down, it shows a man holding a cross and the holy Qur'an, trying to express how Copts & Muslims are one hand against Mubarak because Mubarak's gang specially "NDP" were trying to make a sectarian strife between Muslims & Copts.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Demonstrations; Coptic Church; Egypt; Islam; Protest movements; Revolutions
Crosses; Men; Religious books
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution Photographs; Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo
